professional_summary: A results driven Controls Engineer and Project Manager with over 20 years of experience in manufacturing. Skilled in Industrial Automation and Process Engineering with a strong mechanical design background. Proven ability to lead and motivate high performance teams.

work_experience.description: Managed engineering services and manufacturing processes
responsibilities: Accountable for maintaining efficiency and effectiveness of production manufacturing processes
Manage all engineering services with provision of all energy sources
Support waste water operations by providing advanced troubleshooting on Siemens PLC's
Developed asset management software to track cost, asset history and work order tracking
Performed advanced troubleshooting and PLC support for all plant equipment

work_experience.description: Supervised and coordinated electrical and instrumentation activities
responsibilities: Managed projects for installation of new equipment
Managed large network of Allen-Bradley PLC's
Managed installation and startup of several new projects over $1MM
Performed advanced troubleshooting and PLC support

work_experience.description: Responsible for design review and interpretation
responsibilities: Review and interpret proposed designs, drawings, and specifications
